original_title: Holy Water-Gate: Abuse Cover-up in the Catholic Church
overview: The film begins as a personal journey of filmmaker, Mary Healey, who was also a Catholic. She films a series of historic events where we meet key players involved in the sexual abuse scandal, including victims, whistle-blower priests and a senior ranking US Cardinal who is called upon by the Vatican to control a waxing maelstrom.
title: Holy Water-Gate: Abuse Cover-up in the Catholic Church
